Eat a live frog first thing in the morning and nothing worse will happen to you the rest of the day.

Mark Twain
Eat the Frog

Here at Eat the Frog, the goal is to never stop learning. If you never stop learning, you never stop improving. If you never stop improving, you'll always be better than your past self. I may not be the best at what I do, but I enjoy the challenge and I want to inspire others to find what makes them happy. Ultimately, that's why I'm trying these things. I'm at my best when I'm on the move or getting creative.

Below, you can find some of the things I've already done. Head on over to my Youtube channel to check out what I've done already, or contact me on Twitter if you have an idea on what I should try next. Eat the frog and enjoy your day!

UPDATES

UPDATES

Mar 19, 2019 /updates

Win Condition

I add a basic win condition that requires all chickens to be sacrificed so a level can end and a new one selected.

Mar 5, 2019 /updates

Level Loading

I make a level selection menu and a level load system that will serve as the level hub for the entire game.

Feb 19, 2019 /updates

Level Editing

I make an editor to help speed up the design and creation of levels using a custom editor in Unity.
